explanation: Agent A is correct. The occurrences of "if (1)" in the function are invariant controlling expressions (constant true) and are not being used to form an infinite loop nor are they the permitted do-while constant-false pattern. Therefore they violate MISRA C 2023 Rule 14.3. Recommended fixes are to remove the redundant "if (1)" and make the return unconditional (e.g. replace "if (1) return ...;" with "return ...;"), or restructure the conditional compilation so no invariant controlling expression remains.
